name: Retro Space Command
description:
You're the captain of a space rocket , you need to explore space to discover new planets.

You get points for discovering planets.

In the bottom left is your fuel gauge, if it empties you lose the game, you can refuel at refuelling stations  that are scattered around the map.

Your ship will auto-refuel when close to a refuelling station, with a fricken' laser beam.

W and S keys to move forwards and backwards.

A and D keys to rotate the ship.

Have fun
